TempBuffer.h

00001 #ifndef LANG_TEMPBUFFER_H
00002 #define LANG_TEMPBUFFER_H

00005 #include <lang/pp.h>

00010 
00011 /*  
00012  * IMPLEMENTATION HELPER CLASS. This class handles the actual memory allocation,
00013  * used by the TempBuffer class (to avoid code bloat when the template code gets generated).
00014  *
00015  * @see TempBuffer
00016  */
00017 class ByteTempBuffer
00018 {
00019 public:
00020     enum Constants
00021     {
00023         MAX_TEMP_BUFFERS    = 32,
00024     };
00025 
00027     explicit ByteTempBuffer( int size );
00028 
00030     ByteTempBuffer();
00031 
00033     ~ByteTempBuffer();
00034 
00036     char*           buffer()            {return m_buffer;}
00037 
00039     const char*     buffer() const      {return m_buffer;}
00040 
00041 private:
00042     char*   m_buffer;
00043     int     m_size;
00044     int     m_slot;
00045 
00046     ByteTempBuffer( const ByteTempBuffer& );
00047     ByteTempBuffer& operator=( const ByteTempBuffer& );
00048 };
00049 
00050 
00073 template <class T> class TempBuffer
00074 {
00075 public:
00076     enum Constants
00077     {
00079         MAX_TEMP_BUFFERS                                = ByteTempBuffer::MAX_TEMP_BUFFERS,
00080     };
00081 
00083     explicit TempBuffer( int size )                     : m_buf( sizeof(T)*size ), m_size(size) {}
00084 
00086     ~TempBuffer()                                       {}
00087 
00089     T&      operator[]( int i )                         {return reinterpret_cast<T*>( m_buf.buffer() )[i];}
00090 
00092     T*      buffer()                                    {return reinterpret_cast<T*>( m_buf.buffer() );}
00093 
00095     T*      begin()                                     {return reinterpret_cast<T*>( m_buf.buffer() );}
00096 
00098     T*      end()                                       {return reinterpret_cast<T*>( m_buf.buffer() )+m_size;}
00099 
00101     int     size() const                                {return m_size;}
00102 
00104     const T*    begin() const                           {return reinterpret_cast<const T*>( m_buf.buffer() );}
00105 
00107     const T*    end() const                             {return reinterpret_cast<const T*>( m_buf.buffer() )+m_size;}
00108 
00110     const T&    operator[]( int i ) const               {return reinterpret_cast<T*>( m_buf.buffer() )[i];}
00111 
00112 private:
00113     ByteTempBuffer  m_buf;
00114     int             m_size;
00115 
00116     TempBuffer( const TempBuffer& );
00117     TempBuffer& operator=( const TempBuffer& );
00118 };
00119 
00120 
00121 END_NAMESPACE() // lang

00124 #endif // LANG_TEMPBUFFER_H
